00198     public static class ButtonListener3 implements FieldChangeListener {
00199         Citation c;
00200         CitationScreen3 cs3;
00201                     
00202         public ButtonListener3(CitationScreen3 _cs3, Citation _n3){
00203             cs3 = _cs3;
00204             c = _n3;
00205         }
00206                     
00207         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00208             ButtonField btn4 = (ButtonField) field;
00209             if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Next"){ 
00210                 cs3.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00211                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen4(c));
00212             }
00213             else if(btn4.getLabel().toString() == "Prev"){
00214                 cs3.storeUIFieldsToCitation();
00215                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(cs3);
00216             }   
00217         }
00218     }

00220      static final class MapButtonListener implements FieldChangeListener {
00221        
00222         public MapButtonListener(){
00223         }
00224         
00225         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00226                 MapButtonField btn = (MapButtonField)field;
00227                 if (btn!=null) {
00228                         // update location on button selection
00229                         if (CitationScreen3.currentLocation != null && CitationScreen3.currentLocation.isValid()) {
00230                                 btn.setCoordinates(currentLocation.getCoordinates());
00231                                 btn.run();
00232                         }
00233                         else {
00234                                 Dialog.inform("Unable to determine current location.");
00235                         }
00236                 }
00237         }
00238     }

00240     static final class GPSButtonListener3 implements FieldChangeListener {
00241         private CitationScreen3 cs3 = null;
00242         
00243         public GPSButtonListener3(CitationScreen3 _cs3){
00244                 cs3 = _cs3;
00245         }
00246         
00247         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00248                 ButtonField btn = (ButtonField)field;
00249                 if (btn != null) {
00250                         if (CitationScreen3.currentLocation != null && CitationScreen3.currentLocation.isValid()) {
00251                                         Status.show("Retrieving GPS Address...");
00252                                 double lat = CitationScreen3.currentLocation.getCoordinates().getLatitude();
00253                                 double lon = CitationScreen3.currentLocation.getCoordinates().getLongitude();
00254                                 String mapResult = HTTPGoogleAPI.ReverseGeoQuery(lat, lon);
00255                                 
00256                                 // update form fields with information
00257                                 String gpsString = Double.toString(lat) + ", " + Double.toString(lon);
00258                                 cs3.field_gps.setText(gpsString);
00259                                 
00260                                 String[] addressList = HTTPGoogleAPI.getAddressList(mapResult);
00261                                 
00262                                 if (addressList != null && addressList.length > 0)
00263                                 {
00264                                         cs3.field_gps_addrlist.setChoices(addressList);
00265                                         cs3.field_address.setText(HTTPGoogleAPI.parseAddressResult(addressList[0], HTTPGoogleAPI.ParseType.ADDRESS));
00266                                         cs3.field_city.setText(HTTPGoogleAPI.parseAddressResult(addressList[0], HTTPGoogleAPI.ParseType.CITY));
00267                                         cs3.field_state.setText(HTTPGoogleAPI.parseAddressResult(addressList[0], HTTPGoogleAPI.ParseType.STATE));
00268                                         cs3.field_zip.setText(HTTPGoogleAPI.parseAddressResult(addressList[0], HTTPGoogleAPI.ParseType.ZIP));
00269                                 }
00270                                 else
00271                                 {
00272                                     Dialog.inform("Unable to determine address from GPS location.");
00273                                 }
00274                         }
00275                         else {
00276                             StringBuffer msg = new StringBuffer("Unable to determine current location. ");
00277                             Dialog.inform(msg.toString());
00278                         }
00279                 }
00280         }
00281     }

00283     static final class GSPSelectionChanged3 implements FieldChangeListener {
00284         
00285         private CitationScreen3 cs3;
00286         
00287         public GSPSelectionChanged3(CitationScreen3 _cs3){
00288                 cs3 = _cs3;
00289         }
00290         
00291         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00292                         ObjectChoiceField fld = null;
00293                         try {
00294                                  fld = (ObjectChoiceField)field;
00295                         }
00296                         catch (ClassCastException ex){
00297                                 return;
00298                         }
00299                         
00300                 // only update address fields if user has selected an entry
00301                 if (fld != null && context == 2) 
00302                 {
00303                         int idx = fld.getSelectedIndex();
00304                         String fullAddress = (String)fld.getChoice(idx);
00305                         
00306                         cs3.field_address.setText(HTTPGoogleAPI.parseAddressResult(fullAddress, HTTPGoogleAPI.ParseType.ADDRESS));
00307                         cs3.field_city.setText(HTTPGoogleAPI.parseAddressResult(fullAddress, HTTPGoogleAPI.ParseType.CITY));
00308                         cs3.field_state.setText(HTTPGoogleAPI.parseAddressResult(fullAddress, HTTPGoogleAPI.ParseType.STATE));
00309                         cs3.field_zip.setText(HTTPGoogleAPI.parseAddressResult(fullAddress, HTTPGoogleAPI.ParseType.ZIP));
00310                 }
00311          }
00312      }

00327     private MenuItem getItem3 = new MenuItem("Get", 110, 11) {

00339     private void storeUIFieldsToCitation()
00340     {
00341         c.Loc.setElement(CLocation.ADDRESS, field_address.getText());
00342         c.Loc.setElement(CLocation.CITY, field_city.getText());
00343         c.Loc.setElement(CLocation.STATE, field_state.getText());
00344         c.Loc.setElement(CLocation.ZIP, field_zip.getText()); 
00345         
00346         // get the time value and re-convert back to a full date string
00347         //c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.DATE, (new Date(field_date.getDate()).toString()));
00348         //c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.TIME, (new Date(field_time.getDate()).toString()));
00349         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.DATE, field_date.toString());
00350         c.Violation.setElement(CViolation.TIME, field_time.toString());
00351         
00352         
00353         String hwyStatus = field_highway.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00354         String commonStatus = field_commonplace.getChecked() ? "true" : "false";
00355         c.Loc.setElement(CLocation.HIGHWAY, hwyStatus);  
00356         c.Loc.setElement(CLocation.COMMONPLACE, commonStatus);  
00357         System.out.println("in storeUIFieldsToCitation: " + hwyStatus);
00358         System.out.println("in storeUIFieldsToCitation: " + commonStatus);
00359     }
00360   
00361     
00366     private void restoreUIFieldsFromCitation()
00367     {
00368         field_address.setText(c.Loc.getElement(CLocation.ADDRESS));
00369         field_city.setText(c.Loc.getElement(CLocation.CITY));
00370         field_state.setText(c.Loc.getElement(CLocation.STATE));
00371         field_zip.setText(c.Loc.getElement(CLocation.ZIP));
00372         
00373         String temp_date = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.DATE);
00374         // that's dumb - date.toString() inserts GMT which HttpDateParser can't seem to handle
00375         int startGMT = temp_date.indexOf("GMT ");
00376         int endGMT = startGMT + 4; 
00377         if ( startGMT > 0 )
00378         {
00379                 temp_date = temp_date.substring(0, startGMT) + temp_date.substring(endGMT);
00380         }
00381         long td = HttpDateParser.parse(temp_date);
00382         field_date.setDate(td);
00383         
00384         String temp_time = c.Violation.getElement(CViolation.TIME);
00385         // that's dumb - date.toString() inserts GMT which HttpDateParser can't seem to handle
00386         startGMT = temp_time.indexOf("GMT ");
00387         endGMT = startGMT + 4; 
00388         if ( startGMT > 0 )
00389         {   // strip 'GMT ' out of the time string
00390                 temp_time = temp_time.substring(0, startGMT) + temp_time.substring(endGMT);
00391         }
00392         long tt = HttpDateParser.parse(temp_time);
00393         field_time.setDate(tt);
00394         
00395         boolean hwyStatus = c.Loc.getElement(CLocation.HIGHWAY).equals("true");
00396         boolean commonStatus = c.Loc.getElement(CLocation.COMMONPLACE).equals("true");
00397         System.out.println("commonStatus: " + commonStatus);
00398         System.out.println("getElement: " + c.Loc.getElement(CLocation.COMMONPLACE).equals("true"));
00399         field_highway.setChecked(hwyStatus);
00400         field_commonplace.setChecked(commonStatus);    
00401     }
